divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I took the kids to the local park. The kids were running around kicking a soccer ball my husband was on the court playing a game of basketball. I heard the sound of an airplane and started to yell for my kids to look at it. I frze in my tracks, it looked like something was caught on the tail of the plane and being pulled. Like a little plane would pull a banner...only this was a passenger plane. I then thought maybe it was a parade float but the plane kept going all the while the object kept rotating slowly. It was all colors and had thextentitions came in rigthe plane kept going it stopped hovered all while rotating then went up and into the couds as the clouds moved the object had disappeared.
